import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, BarChart, Bar } from 'recharts'; import { mockUsers, products } from '../data/mockData'; import './Dashboard.css'; const Dashboard = ({ liveData }) => { const [timeRange, setTimeRange] = useState('monthly'); // Simple stats data matching your image const stats = [ { title: 'Total Users', value: '1,251', change: '+12%', changeType: 'positive', description: 'from last month', icon: 'üë•' }, { title: 'Total Products', value: '243', change: '+5%', changeType: 'positive', description: 'from last month', icon: 'üì¶' }, { title: 'Activity Sessions', value: '1,842', change: '+2%', changeType: 'positive', description: 'from last month', icon: 'üîó' }, { title: 'Conversion Rate', value: '3.2%', change: '-0.4%', changeType: 'negative', description: 'from last month', icon: 'üìä' }, { title: 'Monthly Revenue', value: '$12,458', change: '+8%', changeType: 'positive', description: 'from last month', icon: 'üí∞' }, { title: 'Avg. Order Value', value: '$89.50', change: '-5.2%', changeType: 'negative', description: 'from last month', icon: 'üõí' } ]; // Simple revenue data for charts const revenueData = [ { month: 'Jan', revenue: 8200, orders: 45 }, { month: 'Feb', revenue: 9800, orders: 52 }, { month: 'Mar', revenue: 7500, orders: 38 }, { month: 'Apr', revenue: 11200, orders: 61 }, { month: 'May', revenue: 8900, orders: 47 }, { month: 'Jun', revenue: 12458, orders: 68 } ]; // Recent activity data const recentActivity = [ { user: 'John Doe', action: 'placed an order', time: '2 min ago', type: 'order' }, { user: 'Sarah Smith', action: 'created an account', time: '5 min ago', type: 'user' }, { user: 'Mike Johnson', action: 'completed purchase', time: '10 min ago', type: 'purchase' }, { user: 'Emily Davis', action: 'updated profile', time: '15 min ago', type: 'profile' } ]; const CustomTooltip = ({ active, payload, label }) => { if (active && payload && payload.length) { return (

{label}

{payload.map((entry, index) => (

{entry.name}: {entry.name === 'revenue' ? '$' : ''}{entry.value}{entry.name === 'revenue' ? '' : ''}

))}
); } return null; }; const exportData = () => { alert('Data exported successfully!'); }; return (
{/* Header Section */}

Dashboard Overview

Real-time analytics and performance metrics

üîç
{/* Live Status Bar */} {liveData && (
üë• Live Users: {liveData.liveUsers?.toLocaleString() || '1,251'}
üõí Active Orders: {liveData.activeOrders || '43'}
üí∞ Revenue ${liveData.revenue?.toLocaleString() || '11,646'}
‚ö° Response: {liveData.responseTime || '142'}ms
System: {liveData.systemHealth || 'healthy'}

LIVE
)} {/* Main Stats Grid */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.icon}

{stat.value}

{stat.change} {stat.description}
{stat.title}
))}
{/* Charts Section */}

Monthly Revenue

`$${value/1000}k`} /> } />
{/* Orders Chart */}

Last 6 months
} />
{/* Bottom Section */}

{activity.type === 'order' && 'üì¶'} {activity.type === 'user' && 'üë§'} {activity.type === 'purchase' && 'üí∞'} {activity.type === 'profile' && 'üë§'}
{activity.user} {activity.action}
{activity.time}
))}
